Billings.Yellowstone Art Museum:
The Yellowstone Art Museum in downtown Billings, Montana is the largest contemporary art museum in Montana.


== History and mission of the museum ==
The Yellowstone Art Center (now the Yellowstone Art Museum, or YAM) opened in October 1964 in the former Yellowstone County Jail. The construction of the county jail in 1884 was the first act of the newly instituted Yellowstone County government.
